snippet.title: CIPHER ZERO: Next Fest Announcement
snippet.description:
A defunct world without a guide; glyphs without a manual. A minimalist logic game.

CIPHER ZERO drops you into an inexplicably barren world, filled with more than 200 handcrafted puzzles spread out across several environments. Both the world and soundtrack evolve as you decode the rules of several mysterious glyphs.

Available for demo on June 19th at Steam Next Fest!

Wishlist on Steam: https://zpdt.co/playcz

Follow us to keep up to date!
Website: https://cipherzerogame.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cipherzerogame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cipherzerogame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cipherzerogame

#Puzzle #IndieGame #SteamNextFest
